preference.name: AWC_DisplayableChangeTypes
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of "ChangeItemRevision" types that are presented in the "Change Management" application in the Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are types internal names.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeNoticeRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for ChangeNoticeRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0SimpleChangeRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for Cm0SimpleChangeRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeRequestRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for ChangeRequestRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0DevRqstRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for Cm0DevRqstRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_ProblemReportRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for ProblemReportRevision objects.

preference.name: CMMyChangesSublocationQuery
preference.preference_description: Registers the saved queries for the contents of the tabs in "My Changes" Location. Valid values are in the format "tab_name,saved_query_name".

preference.name: CM_GnChangeNoticeRevision_AddToMyChange_Relations
preference.preference_description: Defines list of relations which needs to be presented when object of type "ChangeNoticeRevision" is selected on "Add To My Changes" panel in Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are internal of relation types.

preference.name: CM_GnChangeRequestRevision_AddToMyChange_Relations
preference.preference_description: Defines list of relations which needs to be presented when object of type "ChangeRequestRevision" or "DeviationRequestRevision" is selected on "Add To My Changes" panel in Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are internal of relation types.

preference.name: CM_GnProblemReportRevision_AddToMyChange_Relations
preference.preference_description: Defines list of relations which needs to be presented when object of type "ProblemReportRevision" is selected on "Add To My Changes" panel in Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are internal of relation types.

preference.name: CM_Cm0SimpleChangeRevision_AddToMyChange_Relations
preference.preference_description: Defines list of relations which needs to be presented when object of type "Cm0SimpleChangeRevision" is selected on "Add To My Changes" panel in Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are internal of relation types.

preference.name: CMEnableChangeDashboard
preference.preference_description: Enable Change Dashboard to be shown on Dashboard Sublocation.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0CfgAudit.CREATERENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of create stylesheet for Configuration Audit objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeRequest.CREATERENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of create stylesheet for ChangeRequest objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeNotice.CREATERENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of create stylesheet for ChangeNotice objects.

preference.name: AWC_ProblemReport.CREATERENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of create stylesheet for ProblemReport objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0DevRqst.CREATERENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of create stylesheet for Cm0DevRqst objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0ActionItemRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for Action Item Revision objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0CfgAuditRevision.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for Configuration Audit Revision objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeItem.SUMMARYRENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of summary stylesheet for ChangeItem objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeNoticeRevision.INFORENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of the information stylesheet for ChangeNoticeRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0SimpleChangeRevision.INFORENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of the information stylesheet for SimpleChangeRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_ChangeRequestRevision.INFORENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of the information stylesheet for ChangeRequestRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_Cm0DevRqstRevision.INFORENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of the information stylesheet for DeviationRequestRevision objects.

preference.name: AWC_ProblemReportRevision.INFORENDERING
preference.preference_description: Registration of the information stylesheet for ProblemReportRevision objects.

preference.name: CM_GraphViews.Change
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of view names for "Dependency" tab in the client. The view names are defined in Change UI configuration file, which is stored in the data set named by the value of preference "CM_graph_legend_configuration_file_name".

preference.name: CM_graph_legend_configuration_file_name
preference.preference_description: Registers the name of dataset which stores an XML file containing the Change Graph UI configuration. This is a site preference.

preference.name: CM_graph_presentation_rules_file_name
preference.preference_description: Registers the name of dataset which stores an XML file containing the Presentation Rules of the shapes. This is a site preference.

preference.name: CM_graph_presentation_styles_file_name
preference.preference_description: Registers the name of dataset which stores an XML file containing the Presentation Styles of the shapes. This is a site preference.

preference.name: CM_derive_thumbnail_from_relations
preference.preference_description: Enable derive thumbnail from relation to Change Item Revision. This is a site preference.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_RelationBrowserViews.Relations.ChangeItemRevision
preference.preference_description: default the display view of relation browser to "Change View" for object type ChangeItemRevision context.

preference.name: Cm0ImpactedItemReleasedStatuses
preference.preference_description: This preference holds the list of possible release statuses to be considered for an item revision to be added as an impacted revision for the corresponding solutions added to a Change Notice.
